title: IIFL Finance appoints former SBI boss as chairman - Economic Times
content: IIFL Finance appoints former SBI boss as chairman  Economic Times
description: Purwar is a veteran banker and was Chairman of the countrys largest bank - State Bank of India from November 2002 to May 2006. He was credited with the core banking initiative and stepping up the banks focus on the retail segment. He played an important role in starting SBIs life insurance company- SBI Life Insurance Company.
